extralanguagelink-desc:
{{desc|name=ExtraLanguageLink|url=https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:ExtraLanguageLink}}

"in other languages" should be consistent with {{msg-mw|Otherlanguages}}.
extralanguagelink-param-class: Localised name for the "class=" parameter for the {{extralanguagelink}} magic word. {{Identical|Class}}
extralanguagelink-param-hreflang: Localised name for the "hreflang=" parameter for the {{extralanguagelink}} magic word. "hreflang" is short for "hyper-reference language" and means "language in which the target page is written".
extralanguagelink-param-lang: Localised name for the "lang=" parameter for the {{extralanguagelink}} magic word. {{Identical|Language}}
extralanguagelink-param-style: Localised name for the "style=" parameter for the {{extralanguagelink}} magic word. {{Identical|Style}}
extralanguagelink-badinterwiki: An error message. Parameters: * $1 - an interwiki prefix (e.g. w or commons), which should be followed by a colon (:)
extralanguagelink-badtitle:
An error message. Parameters:
* $1 - some user-supplied piece of text, supposed to be a page title or link
